Package dao

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
dao.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
This is the super class AbstractDAO that has methods for every DAO in the project. It creates a query for each operation no matter the table and also statements to be executed.
